original_text: Joel son of Zikri was their chief officer, and Judah son of Hassenuah was over the New Quarter of the city.
korean_text: 시그리의 아들 요엘이 그들의 감독이 되었고 핫스누아의 아들 유다는 버금이 되어 성읍을 다스렸느니라

sentences.original_text: Joel son of Zikri was their chief officer
Judah son of Hassenuah was over the New Quarter
sentences.korean_translation: 하세누아의 아들 유다는 새 구역을 담당했으며
